mapper.sql: id, cust_id, auth_status, gmt_expiry, gmt_succeed, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert:
insert into risk_auth_job (cust_id, auth_status, gmt_expiry, gmt_succeed, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values
(#{item.custId}, #{item.authStatus}, NULL, #{item.gmtSucceed}, #{item.gmtCreate}, #{item.gmtModified})
mapper.update:
update risk_auth_job
cust_id = #{custId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
auth_status = #{authStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_expiry = #{gmtExpiry,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_succeed = #{gmtSucceed,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where cust_id = #{custId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update risk_auth_job set cust_id = #{custId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, auth_status = #{authStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_expiry = #{gmtExpiry,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_succeed = #{gmtSucceed,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
